modName: 9601 Armed to the Teeth - easy version
summary:
Questa mod vi permettera\' di mettere in mostra sul vostro personaggio molte armi, facendovi assomigliare ad un vero guerriero.
---------------------------------------------------------------
This mod will allow you to show a lot of weapons on your character, making you look like a true warrior.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]O_IUM9XsDYM[/youtube] [youtube]cE03yUfSDZQ[/youtube]

ENGLISH TRANSLATION BELOW
---------------------------------------------------------
INTRODUZIONE
La mod Armed to the Teeth by Mergweq EwokJedi and Dahaka002011 è davvero utile ed interessante, ma è difficile da usare e da installare soprattutto per chi come me non conosce bene l\'inglese.
Questa mod ha lo stesso effetto di ATTT, ma è molto più facile da usare (ed è priva di bug o problemi).
----------------------------------------------------------
DESCRIZIONE
Dopo aver installato la mod (vedi come fare nella sezione installazione) avviate il gioco, aprite l\'inventario e mettete nei preferiti (tasto F) le armi che volete visualizzare sul vostro personaggio (guardate le immagini).
NON SERVE FARE ALTRO.
Chiudete l\'inventario e le armi appariranno sul vostro personaggio. Se non volete più che le armi vengano visualizzate vi basterà toglierle dai preferiti.
QUESTA MOD FUNZIONA CON TUTTE LE ARMI, COMPRESE QUELLE DI ALTRE MOD.
QUESTA MOD NON RICHIEDE ALTRE MOD
QUESTA MOD NON RICHIEDE Armed to the Teeth by Mergweq EwokJedi and Dahaka002011
QUESTA MOD NON RICHIEDE DAWNGUARD O HEARTHFIRE
QUESTA MOD E\' COMPATIBILE CON DAWNGUARD E HEARTHFIRE
---------------------------------------------------------------
INSTALLAZIONE
Questa mod deve essere scaricata manualmente;
Dopo il download decomprimete il file con WinRAR;
Aprite questa cartella e troverete il file con le istruzioni e un\'immagine per aiutarvi. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------
DISINSTALLAZIONE
Istruzioni per la disinstallazione nel file che dovete scaricare.
------------------------------------------------------------------
CREDITI
A Dahaka002011 per l\'idea originale;
A il mio compagno di scuola e amico per l\'aiuto che mi è stato dato;
A Isilmeriel per la fantastica mod Isilmeriel LOTR Weapons Collection (le armi nelle immagini).
------------------------------------------------------------------
CONCLUSIONI
Scaricate questa mod, aggiungete le vostre immagini, commentate, chiedete informazioni, ma soprattutto buon divertimento con Skyrim.

\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\

ENGLISH (SORRY FOR MY ENGLISH):
INTRODUCTION
The mod Armed to the Teeth by Mergweq EwokJedi and Dahaka002011 is really interesting and useful, but it is difficult to use and to install, especially for people like me who do not know English well.
This mod has the same effect as ATTT, but it is much easier to use (and is free of bugs or problems).
-------------------------------------------------- --------
DESCRIPTION
After installing the mod (see how in the installation section) start the game, open your inventory and put into favorites (button F) the weapons you want to display on your character (see images).
YOU DO NOT NEED TO DO OTHERWISE.
Close the inventory and weapons will appear on your character. If you no longer want the weapons to be displayed you can just remove them from your favorites.
THIS MOD WORKS WITH ALL WEAPONS, INCLUDING THOSE OF OTHER MOD.
THIS MOD DOES NOT REQUIRE OTHER MOD
THIS MOD DOES NOT REQUIRE Armed to the Teeth by Mergweq EwokJedi and Dahaka002011
THIS MOD DOES NOT REQUIRE DAWNGUARD OR HEARTHFIRE
THIS MOD IS COMPATIBLE WITH DAWNGUARD AND HEARTHFIRE
-------------------------------------------------- -------------
INSTALLATION
This mod must be downloaded manually;
After the download, decompress the file with WinRAR;
Open this folder and find the file with instructions and a picture to help you.
-------------------------------------------------- ---------------
UNINSTALL
Instructions for uninstalling the files are into the file.
-------------------------------------------------- ----------------
CREDITS
At Dahaka002011 for the original idea;
At my classmate and friend for the help;
A Isilmeriel for the fantastic mod Isilmeriel LOTR Weapons Collection (weapons in the pictures).
-------------------------------------------------- ----------------
CONCLUSIONS
Download this mod, add your pictures, comment, ask for information, but above all have fun with Skyrim.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sono stato accusato di aver copiato la mod \"Multiple Weapons On Back_ ini edit by TheInternet\", ma vi posso assicurare che non conoscevo questa mod. La mia mod è stata creata da me e da un mio amico.
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
I\'ve been accused of having copied the mod \"Multiple Weapons On Back_ ini edit by TheInternet,\" but I can assure you I did not know this mod. My mod was created by me and my friend.
author: Marco9601
